name: Linnéplatsens Hotel & Hostel
description:
We offer a central and affordable accommodation right in the historic Linnéstaden close to both shopping, restaurants, astostadspuls as entertainment and shady walks.

Linnéplatsens Hotel & Hostel is situated in the heart of green and pleasant neighbourhood Linnéstaden. The location, with a perfect view of Slottsskogen, makes sure that you are close to everything you need.

The clean and comfortable basic rooms offer dormitory rooms, as well as rooms in different sizes, for up to six persons. Toilets and showers are situated in the hallway, close to the rooms. The hostel offer bedlinen and 
breakfast as additional options; if you prefer to cook your own breakfast, they have a fully equipped kitchen. They are also taking care of the cleaning, free of charge, to give you the opportunity to make the most of your time in Göteborg.

The standard rooms offer you a bit of extra comfort; bedlinen, towels, breakfast and daily cleaning are all 
included.

Please note: 
Cancellation policy: 24h advance notice 
Late cancellation or no show - one night charge 
Payment upon arrival by Credit card (Visa and Master Card) and cash (SEK only)

Check in from 15.00 until 19.00 
Check out before 11.00 
Breakfast included only on standard rooms

PLEASE NOTE, if you arrive after 19,00 please contact us in advance 
Taxes included 
Property requests Visa or Mastercard for booking guarantee
directions:
From the central station/Bus terminal
Tram no 1 or 2 takes 10 min from the central station to Linnéplatsen. The hostel is located just across the street from the tram stop. 

From the airports: 
The shuttle (Flygbussarna) takes you from Göteborg City Airport or Landvetter to the central station. From the central station, tram is the best alternative.
